attributes.action:
Expatriate Shamima Begum, for our safety.
Can we risk another concert bombing.
attributes.additional_details: All it takes is 1 bad egg to make a ‘cell’ to do similar attacks in the UK, those 4/5 people could be 4/5 atrocities.
attributes.background:
Shamima Begum, left our country to join Islamic State at 15yo.
As an easily impressionable young adult I feel this could be a risk to our country and family’s by reinstatement of her patriotism.
